Author: DenverTheLastDinosau
Text: Everything will be okay. Get home, and get yourself to a safe space if you can. I don't know why so I might be wrong, but by the way you speak, I'm assuming you're British? There are some really good private charities and eating disorder companies that can help you here when the NHS isn't doing much to help (they're private, but not like, you have to pay for them, they're charities.)   I hope you're doing okay, I have BED too and I am constantly in a cycle of restricting and binging, and sometimes I gain weight rapidly and just want to hide from the world, I just want to tear my flesh to the bone and throw it away in that instant.
